name: Drag Together
description:
Drag Together, a small and wacky game about dragging... eh... things...

Some objects just belong together. Join them and you will be a hero! This is a game made for GMTK 2021 by Roy Tettero and Frank Meier.

Controls

Use your mouse to drag the object to it's destination. Click and hold the left mouse button to grab an object.

Press to return to home screen.
